title: Nonminimal particle-like solutions in cubic scalar field theory
abstract: The cubic scalar field theory admits the bell-shaped solitary wave solutions which can be interpreted as massive Bose particles. We rule out the nonminimal p-brane action for such a solution as the point particle with curvature. When quantizing it as the theory with higher derivatives, it is shown that the corresponding quantum equation has SU(2) dynamical symmetry group realizing the exact spin-coordinate correspondence. Finally, we calculate the quantum corrections to the mass of the bell boson which can not be obtained by means of the perturbation theory starting from the vacuum sector.
